virtualTable.name: power_extended
virtualTable.sql: SELECT geom, 'secondary' as type, CONCAT('http://theworldavatar.com/ontology/ontocredo/ontoukpn/SecondarySubstation/', ogc_fid) as iri, CONCAT('Power Network: Secondary sub-station (', "Substation Name", ')') as name FROM "Credo_SecondarySubstations_GIS"
